preen.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a bird preens or preens itself, it cleans itself and makes its feathers smooth using its beak
preen.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to spend time making yourself look tidier and more attractive
preen.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: a girl preening herself in the mirror
preen.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to look proud and feel pleased because of something you have done
preen.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: He enjoyed the applause, preening himself like a pop star.
